topicTitle: What do you want to see?

posts.postText:
Yes, what do you want to see happen with the CSS server? I need more public traffic so I can feel less tied down by it, and make it seem more enjoyable (because only NNJG people play on it). What's the benifit you say of helping me? Well more traffic, the more people I need to help out being mods*, so it pays it's self!

 * of cource now I have to ask gash first

I'm gonna make an AD for it soon, hopefully it will generate at least 1 guy to the server XD (it did to dum's old tf2 server and thats when i had like 400 subs on youtube, now i got 650)
But um, i voted for "More Valve Maps" even though i would have preferred like 3 other options as well.

Do you mind if i make it so that people can vote 3 times? i think opinions could get across better that way.

>> I'm gonna make an AD for it soon, hopefully it will generate at least 1 guy to the server XD (it did to dum's old tf2 server and thats when i had like 400 subs on youtube, now i got 650)
But um, i voted for "More Valve Maps" even though i would have preferred like 3 other options as well.

Do you mind if i make it so that people can vote 3 times? i think opinions could get across better that way. 

Yea forgot about that. Go ahead.
